articles.title: Mars Helicopter Ingenuity Spots Perseverance Rover During Flight 51 - msnNOW
articles.description: NASA's Mars helicopter Ingenuity flew for the 51st time. The Perseverance rover can be seen in the distance during the flight in an enhanced color image. Credit: Space.com | footage courtesy: NASA/JPL-Caltech | edited by Steve Spaleta

articles.title: New volatile sunspot grows 4 times bigger than the Earth; Will it unleash a solar storm? - HT Tech
articles.description: A new sunspot has emerged on the Sun, which has grown overnight to gain a size four times the size of the Earth. The sunspot likely harbors an unstable magnetic field and can explode, sparking a solar storm.
